Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.57.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.57.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nghttp2 is earlier than 1.57.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-28182
